description: A launcher is now provided for all versions of Ubuntu.

This app functions well for me in Ubuntu 22.04. I found all the features that were advertised in the description. There is also good and helpful documentation included.

The other reviewers are correct in saying that this app does not install its own launcher, so if you want to launch it you'll have to either type 'tdhcad' in the terminal, or create your own .desktop entry for it.
summary: Type 'tdhcad' in a terminal emulator to run it
